definition: terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
end/finish

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: The terminal of the train is BAGOU.
sentences.chinese: 本次列車終點站是巴溝站。

sentences.english: Airport Authority officials carried out a thorough inspection of the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 機場管理局的官員對航空終點站進行了全面的檢查。

sentences.english: The anticipation of waiting for a loved on to exit the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 在終點站等一個心愛的人。

sentences.english: Unique store inner fitting up style, the terminal being that height savours a man.
sentences.chinese: 店內獨特的裝修風格，是高品味男人的終點站。

sentences.english: We will soon arrive at the terminal station, Nanjing South Railway Station.
sentences.chinese: 前方即將到達本次列車的終點站，南京南站。

sentences.english: Take Bus No. 23, get off at the terminal. You'll see the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 坐23路公共汽車到終點站下車，你就會看到醫院。

sentences.english: During the second world war, it was the terminus of the Burma Road.
sentences.chinese: 在二戰期間，它是滇緬公路的終點站。

sentences.english: Question 12: Does Nanjing South Railway Station serve as the terminal for the Subway No. 3?
sentences.chinese: 請問地鐵3號線在南京南站是否爲終點站？

sentences.english: Every one could hop out,it's the terminus.
sentences.chinese: 到終點站了，請大家下車。

sentences.english: Canada was the primary destination for many fugitives.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大是許多逃亡者的首選終點站。

sentences.english: When the bus got to the last stop one hour later, Wang felt very tired.
sentences.chinese: 當公交車一小時後到達終點站，王同學感到很累。

sentences.english: It was no problem reaching the hotel from Termini with luggage.
sentences.chinese: 帶着行李從終點站到酒店絕不成問題。

sentences.english: Here is the end of the railway.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是這條鐵路的終點站。

sentences.english: Yes, Bus No. 12, 53 but where is the nearest bus stop ?
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐12路公交車，在終點站下車即是。

sentences.english: Yau Ma Tei, end of the Kwun Tong Line, thank you for travelling on the MTR.
sentences.chinese: 油麻地，這是觀塘線的終點站，謝謝乘搭地鐵。

sentences.english: You are a way of life with my walking in a destination.
sentences.chinese: 你是一條路帶我行走於人生的終點站。

definition: departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
train/CL:列[lie4],節|节[jie2],班[ban1],趟[tang4]
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
rail station/bus stop/CL:處|处[chu4],個|个[ge4]
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to pass through/via/by way of
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
terminus
ferry
last bus or train/last chance
regular bus (service)
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
to reach/to arrive
travel time/expected time for a car journey
a turntable
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
